content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your interest in my apartment, Emilia. However, due to our differing negotiation strategies, let me start by proposing a price higher than what you may expect: 'I agree to the price of 950 Euro!' Now it's your turn to counteroffer and help me achieve the highest possible rent.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your honesty, Mister Schmidt. I am a student and I am looking for a place that is affordable. I am smart and I can negotiate well. I am willing to pay 650 Euro per month. But I am also responsible and dependable, and I will take good care of the apartment. I hope we can find a fair price for both of us.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: While I admire your negotiation skills and assurance of responsible behavior, my priority is maximizing the income from this rental. Therefore, I cannot accept your offer of 650 Euro. 'TERMINATE' However, if you are willing to revise your proposal closer to my expectations, we can resume the negotiation. Keep in mind my goal to secure the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
